org.randomstack.jme

Class JmeLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.app.LegacyApplication
      • com.jme3.app.SimpleApplication
        • org.randomstack.jme.JmeLauncher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.app.Application, com.jme3.system.SystemListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThirdPersonCameraTest

    public abstract class JmeLauncher
extends com.jme3.app.SimpleApplication
    An abstract class that should be used as a starting point for a JME application. This implementation handles some default boilerplate code as: - configuring logging - loading application settings using ApplicationSettingsFactory - removing default key mappings - initializing Lemur GuiGlobals - initializing ApplicationGlobals Application settings can be

    • Field Summary
